description: Critical thinking assignment involving arguments for/against renewable energy transition statements using generative AI. Students spend 10-12 hours.
Three quizzes assessing course content: Quiz 1 (untimed, 4-5 hours), Quizzes 2-3 (timed, 1 hour each). Feedback provided post-deadline.
Gameplay assessment using PlayEnergy to evaluate renewable energy scenarios. Requires ~20 hours of gameplay throughout term.
15-minute oral interview examining comprehensive course knowledge.
